emails.subject: Request for Enterprise Agreement Proposal
emails.body: Hello, We would like to explore an enterprise agreement for our global operations. Could you please provide the detailed proposal and pricing options? We are particularly interested in volume discounts and support levels. Looking forward to your response.

emails.subject: Re: Request for Enterprise Agreement Proposal
emails.body: Hi, Thank you for reaching out. I have attached the initial draft of our enterprise agreement proposal. It includes tiered pricing, support tiers, and implementation timelines. Please review and let me know if you need any clarifications.

emails.subject: Re: Request for Enterprise Agreement Proposal
emails.body: Thanks for the draft. I have a few questions regarding the SLA response times and escalation procedures. Can we schedule a call to discuss these points?

emails.subject: Re: Request for Enterprise Agreement Proposal
emails.body: Of course. I am available tomorrow at 3 PM UTC. I will send a calendar invite shortly. Looking forward to our call.
